title: datalad create -d . subds  within subdirectory didn't add new subds to superdataset
body:
```shell
$> datalad install -r ///workshops/nih-2017 
[INFO   ] Cloning dataset from 'http://datasets.datalad.org/workshops/nih-2017' (trying 2 location candidate(s)) to '/tmp/nih-2017' 
install(ok): /tmp/nih-2017 (dataset)
[INFO   ] Installing <Dataset path=/tmp/nih-2017> recursively 
[INFO   ] Cloning dataset from 'http://datasets.datalad.org/workshops/nih-2017/ds000114/.git' (trying 2 location candidate(s)) to '/tmp/nih-2017/ds000114' 
install(ok): ds000114 (dataset) [Installed subdataset <Dataset path=/tmp/nih-2017/ds000114>]
[INFO   ] Cloning dataset from 'http://datasets.datalad.org/workshops/nih-2017/ds000114/derivatives/fmriprep/.git' (trying 1 location candidate(s)) to '/tmp/nih-2017/ds000114/derivatives/fmriprep' 
install(ok): ds000114/derivatives/fmriprep (dataset) [Installed subdataset <Dataset path=/tmp/nih-2017/ds000114/derivatives/fmriprep>]
[INFO   ] Cloning dataset from 'http://datasets.datalad.org/workshops/nih-2017/ds000114/derivatives/freesurfer/.git' (trying 1 location candidate(s)) to '/tmp/nih-2017/ds000114/derivatives/freesurfer' 
install(ok): ds000114/derivatives/freesurfer (dataset) [Installed subdataset <Dataset path=/tmp/nih-2017/ds000114/derivatives/freesurfer>]
action summary:
  install (ok: 4)
datalad install -r ///workshops/nih-2017  4.77s user 1.02s system 21% cpu 27.180 total
2 33973.....................................:Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:09:46 PM EDT:.
hopa:/tmp
$> cd nih-2017/ds000114/derivatives 
fmriprep/  freesurfer/
2 33974.....................................:Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:09:53 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/nih-2017/ds000114[master]derivatives
$> datalad create -d . reconall    
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/nih-2017/ds000114/derivatives/reconall 
create(ok): reconall (dataset)                                                   
2 33975.....................................:Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:10:05 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/nih-2017/ds000114[master]derivatives
$> git status
On branch master
Your branch is up-to-date with 'origin/master'.
Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)

	reconall/

nothing added to commit but untracked files present (use "git add" to track)
```
reproduces on a simple case too (just message for status confused us at first)
```shell
$> datalad create /tmp/testt   

[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/testt 
create(ok): /tmp/testt (dataset)                                                                          
2 34001.....................................:Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:15:12 PM EDT:.
hopa:/tmp
$> cd testt 
2 34002.....................................:Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:15:18 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/testt[master]
$> mkdir d
2 34003.....................................:Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:15:21 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/testt[master]
$> cd d
2 34004.....................................:Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:15:22 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/testt[master]d
$> datalad create -d . reconall
[INFO   ] Creating a new annex repo at /tmp/testt/d/reconall 
create(ok): reconall (dataset)                                                                            
2 34005.....................................:Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:15:25 PM EDT:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/testt[master]d
$> git status
On branch master
Untracked files:
  (use "git add <file>..." to include in what will be committed)

	./

nothing added to commit but untracked files present (use "git add" to track)
```
